name: Alb Aviation Training
about: ALB Aviation Training, located in Oradea, Romania, is a Declared Training Organisation (DTO) recognised by the Romanian Civil Aviation Authority since 2020. Founded by two aviation enthusiasts, David Nagy Molnar and Patrick Puskeiler, the school was established to address the lack of flight training opportunities in the north-western part of Romania. ALB Aviation offers a wide range of training programs, including private pilot licenses for airplanes and helicopters, as well as sailplane training. The school is committed to high standards and quality, with instructors holding commercial licenses and extensive experience in aviation. ALB Aviation provides comprehensive support, including accommodation and transport assistance, ensuring a seamless learning experience for its students. With a focus on excellence and safety, ALB Aviation Training is dedicated to producing skilled and competent pilots.
